survey_name: Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Station User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from EV owners about their experiences with public and home charging stations, including ease of use, availability, and satisfaction levels.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What types of charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who use public charging stations (Q1 not 'Never').
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who use public charging stations (Q1 not 'Never').

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who use public charging stations (Q1 not 'Never').
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who use public charging stations (Q1 not 'Never').

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who use public charging stations (Q1 not 'Never').
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Do you have a home EV charging station?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity.

script.question_text: Do you have a home EV charging station?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your home EV charging station?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who have a home EV charging station (Q5 = 'Yes').
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your home EV charging station?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who have a home EV charging station (Q5 = 'Yes').

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to use public EV charging stations more often?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.
